summary: A young turn-of-the-century newspaper man finds he can get hold of the next day's paper. This brings more problems than fortune, especially as his new girlfriend is part of a phony clairvoyant act.
cast: Dick Powell|Linda Darnell|Jack Oakie|Edgar Kennedy|John Philliber|Edward Brophy|George Cleveland|Sig Ruman|Paul Guilfoyle|George Chandler|Eddie Acuff|Luis Alberni|Fred Aldrich|Stanley Andrews|Vangie Beilby|Eddie Borden|Fairfax Burger|Romaine Callender|Eddy Chandler|Davison Clark|Eddie Coke|Jimmy Conlin|Robert Dudley|Emma Dunn|Fern Emmett|Mary Field|Bess Flowers|William Forrest|Jack Gardner|Gibson Gowland|Ethel Griffies|Ben Hall|Charles Halton|Harry Hayden|Earle Hodgins|Robert Homans|Bud Jamison|Eilene Janssen|Robert Emmett Keane|Kay Linaker|Marion Martin|Howard M. Mitchell|Patsy Nash|'Snub' Pollard|Victor Potel|Tom Quinn|Janet Shaw|Charles Sherlock|Dorothy Vaughan|Claire Whitney
title: Sucedió mañana
